import React from 'react' import HomeScreen from './HomeScreen' function MyBag() { const userName = localStorage.getItem('mail'); const [books, setBooks] = useState([]); fetch('http://localhost:3033/borrowed/' + userName, { method: 'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setBooks(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); return (
{books.map(book => ( ))}
Id Title Category Quantity Borrowing date Expiration date
{book.ID} {book.Name} {book.Categories} {book.quantity} {book.borrowing_date} {book.expiration_date}
) } export default MyBag
